entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 11:45 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
